readable.title: 842960985_91daf0d6ec
readable.content: A man in a beige trench coat is walking in the rain . A man in a tan trench coat and blue jeans walks with a black umbrella open over his head . A man in a trench coat is walking with an umbrella . A man with white hair , a long trench coat and an umbrella walks past a parking meter . Man walking with his umbrella in a bleak street .
